wsdl:documentation.name: ERP Integration Service
wsdl:documentation.description: provides external web service operations for ERP integration scenarios.

oer:operation.name: getESSJobStatus
oer:operation.description: Obtains the request status of the submitted ESS job.

oer:parameter.name: requestId
oer:parameter.description: The request ID of the submitted ESS job.

oer:return.description: Returns the current status of the ESS job.

oer:operation.name: getDfltObjAttrHints
oer:operation.description: An operation to retrieve user interface hints, such as the service data object label and object attribute labels, for the specified service data object and locale. As a prerequisite, invoke the getEntityList operation defined on this service to get the list of possible values for the viewName request payload element.

oer:parameter.name: viewName
oer:parameter.description: The service view usage name, an internal name for the service data object. Specify the value of the <name> element from the getEntityList operation response payload.

oer:parameter.name: localeName
oer:parameter.description: The locale to use when evaluating locale-based user interface hints. The localeName is in ISO 639-1 format.

oer:return.description: The label and user interface hints for the specified service data object and its attributes in a name-value pair format

oer:operation.name: getServiceLastUpdateTime
oer:operation.description: An operation that returns the date and time when the schema files referenced in the service definition last changed.

oer:return.description: The date and time when the service definition last changed in ISO 8601 format.

oer:operation.name: getEntityList
oer:operation.description: An operation to get the list of service data objects defined on this service.

oer:return.description: A list of service data objects defined on this service. For each service data object, the result includes the QName, internal name, and Boolean values indicating whether create, update, merge, and delete operations can be performed on the object.

oer:operation.name: submitESSJobRequest
oer:operation.description: Submits an ESS job request for the specified job definition.

oer:parameter.name: jobPackageName
oer:parameter.description: The ESS job package name for the ESS job that must be submitted.

oer:parameter.name: jobDefinitionName
oer:parameter.description: The ESS job definition name for the ESS job that must be submitted.

oer:parameter.name: paramList
oer:parameter.description: List of parameters used to invoke the ESS job. The order of the parameters is maintained as per the list. The corresponding entry in the list should be blank when a given parameter is not passed.

oer:return.description: Returns the request ID of the submitted ESS job.

oer:operation.name: submitJobWithOutput
oer:operation.description: Submits an ESS job to export and uploads the job output to the Universal Content Management server.

oer:parameter.name: jobPackageName
oer:parameter.description: The ESS job package name for the ESS job that must be submitted.

oer:parameter.name: jobDefinitionName
oer:parameter.description: The ESS job definition name for the ESS job that must be submitted.

oer:parameter.name: callbackURL
oer:parameter.description: The callback URL of the service implemented by the customers to receive the ESS job status on job completion.

oer:parameter.name: paramList
oer:parameter.description: List of parameters used to invoke the ESS job. The order of the parameters is maintained as per the list. The corresponding entry in the list should be blank when a given parameter is not passed.

oer:return.description: Returns the request ID of the submitted ESS job.

oer:operation.name: getDocumentIdsForFilePrefix
oer:operation.description: Gets the document identifiers for files that match the file prefix and specified account. These files do not contain the specified comments.

oer:parameter.name: prefix
oer:parameter.description: The file prefix used to search for the files that start with a specificed prefix.

oer:parameter.name: account
oer:parameter.description: The account parameter used to search for the files that belongs to a specified security account.

oer:parameter.name: comments
oer:parameter.description: The parameter is used to pass the comments. Files that do not have the comments are retreived.

oer:return.description: Returns a list of document Identifiers.

oer:operation.name: getDocumentForDocumentId
oer:operation.description: The operation is used to get the document that matches the given Document Identifier

oer:parameter.name: DocumentId
oer:parameter.description: The numeric document identifier of a file.

oer:return.description: Returns a list of elements, each containing the details of the downloaded files. The details include the document ID, file content, file name, content type, file title, author, security group, and account.

oer:operation.name: getDocumentsForFilePrefix
oer:operation.description: Gets the files that match the file prefix and specified account. These files do not contain the specified comments.

oer:parameter.name: prefix
oer:parameter.description: The file prefix used to search for the files that start with a specificed prefix.

oer:parameter.name: account
oer:parameter.description: The account parameter used to search for the files that belongs to a specified security account.

oer:parameter.name: comments
oer:parameter.description: The comments that are not present in the files.

oer:return.description: Returns a list of elements, each containing the details of the downloaded files. The details include the document ID, file content, file name, content type, file title, author, security group, and account.

oer:operation.name: uploadFileToUcm
oer:operation.description: Uploads a file to the Universal Content Management server based on the document specified.

oer:parameter.name: document
oer:parameter.description: List of elements, each containing the details of the file to be uploaded. The details include the file content, file name, content type, file title, author, security group, and account.

oer:return.description: Returns the document ID of the uploaded file.

oer:operation.name: downloadESSJobExecutionDetails
oer:operation.description: Downloads the ESS job output and the logs as a zip file.

oer:parameter.name: requestId
oer:parameter.description: The request ID of the submitted ESS job.

oer:parameter.name: fileType
oer:parameter.description: The file type used to determine the execution details to download. Specify the file type as log to download the log file and output file. Specify the file type as out to download the output file. Download the log files and output files when no file type is specified.

oer:return.description: Returns a list of elements, each containing the details of the downloaded files. The details include the document ID, file content, file name, content type, file title, author, security group, and account.

oer:operation.name: appendFileComment
oer:operation.description: Appends the specified comments to a file.

oer:parameter.name: documentId
oer:parameter.description: The numeric document identifier of a file.

oer:parameter.name: comments
oer:parameter.description: Appends the specified comments to a file.

oer:operation.name: downloadExportOutput
oer:operation.description: The method downloads the output of ESS job

oer:parameter.name: requestId
oer:parameter.description: The parameter is used to pass the request id of the ESS job.

oer:return.description: The list of document details for the document is returned

oer:operation.name: loadAndImportData
oer:operation.description: Uploads a file to the Oracle Universal Content Management server based on the document specified and submits the ESS jobs to import and process the uploaded file.

oer:parameter.name: document
oer:parameter.description: List of elements, each containing the details of the file to be uploaded. The details include the file content, file name, content type, file title, author, security group, and account.

oer:parameter.name: jobList
oer:parameter.description: List of elements, each containing the details of the ESS job to be submitted to import and process the uploaded file. The details include the job definition name, job package name, and list of parameters.

oer:parameter.name: interfaceDetails
oer:parameter.description: The interface whose data is to be loaded.

oer:parameter.name: notificationCode
oer:parameter.description: Two digit code representing the type and when a notification is to be sent

oer:parameter.name: callbackURL
oer:parameter.description: The callback URL of the service implemented by the customers to receive the ESS job status on job completion.

oer:return.description: Returns response code containing error details

oer:operation.name: importBulkData
oer:operation.description: Uploads a file to the Oracle Universal Content Management server based on the document specified and submits the ESS jobs to import and process the uploaded file with multiple options.

oer:parameter.name: document
oer:parameter.description: List of elements, each containing the details of the file to be uploaded. The details include the file content, file name, content type, file title, author, security group, and account.

oer:parameter.name: jobDetails
oer:parameter.description: List of elements, each containing the details of the ESS job to be submitted to import and process the uploaded file. The details include the job definition name, job package name, and list of parameters.

oer:parameter.name: notificationCode
oer:parameter.description: Two digit code representing the type and when a notification is to be sent.

oer:parameter.name: callbackURL
oer:parameter.description: The callback URL of the service implemented by the customers to receive the ESS job status on job completion.

oer:parameter.name: jobOptions
oer:parameter.description: A web service operation input parameter. It designates the specific inbound bulk data processing variation selected and the output file type that will be generated upon completion of the data processing.

oer:return.description: Returns response code containing error details

oer:operation.name: exportBulkData
oer:operation.description: Submits an ESS job to export and uploads the job output to the Universal Content Management server with callback and notification.

oer:parameter.name: jobName
oer:parameter.description: The ESS job package name and definition name for the ESS job that must be submitted.

oer:parameter.name: parameterList
oer:parameter.description: Parameters used to invoke the ESS job.

oer:parameter.name: jobOptions
oer:parameter.description: A web service operation input parameter which will allow new attributes to be used for future enhancements to ensure data model flexibility.

oer:parameter.name: callbackURL
oer:parameter.description: The callback URL of the service implemented by the customers to receive the ESS job status on job completion.

oer:parameter.name: notificationCode
oer:parameter.description: Two digit code representing the type and when a notification is to be sent.

oer:return.description: Returns the request ID of the submitted ESS job.

dsig:X509IssuerSerial.dsig:X509IssuerName: CN=CertGenCA, OU=FOR TESTING ONLY, O=MyOrganization, L=MyTown, ST=MyState, C=US
